title: Biden Wave? Cruise Lines Lying? 3.12.20
itunes:title: Biden Wave? Cruise Lines Lying? 3.12.20
description:
In episode 585, Miles and special guest host Laci Mosley are joined by comedian Brooks Wheelan to discuss Harvey Weinstein's sentencing, the Biden wave, Trump's economic stimulus plan, Norwegian Cruise Lines being shady, Joel Osteen continuing his services regardless of the coronavirus scare, Disney's Avengers land coming soon, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Harvey Weinstein’s Stunning Downfall: 23 Years in Prison
  2. As Biden wave continues on 'mini Tuesday,' here are 5 key points going forward
  3. Talks Begin on Stimulus Plan as Trump Plays Down Virus Threat
  4. Norwegian Cruise Lines Pushes Staff to Sell Trips by Lying About the Coronavirus
  5. JOEL OSTEEN HIS HOLY SHOW'S ROLLING ON ... Amid Coronavirus Pandemic
  6. Disney Sets Opening Date For Avengers Campus, Reveals More Details About California Adventure’s Marvel-Themed Attractions
  7. WATCH: ZGTO - Whippin’

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
